suite.name: NavigatieHoofdMenu

test.name: Make sure user if logged off before we start

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Select Window
kw.doc: DEPRECATED in SeleniumLibrary 4.0. , use `Switch Window` instead.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.name: Verify Menu Option Aanloggen

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.doc: DEPRECATED in SeleniumLibrary 4.0. , use `Switch Window` instead.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Select Frame
kw.doc: Sets frame identified by ``locator`` as the current frame.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

arguments.arg: Vul hier je toegangscode en wachtwoord in
